attributes.action: DWP staff should be trained to give the same information every time they are contacted
attributes.additional_details:
On contacting the DWP, their staff should give claimants the correct information.  For example, if an appointment is needed for Jobcentre Plus to hand a sick note in, claimants should be told this.  This saves wasted journeys.

Also,  when the DWP are contacted by a letter with questions in said letter, they should contact the claimant as soon as possible preferably with the correct information.
